page.title: 10LLANDYSUL MEALS ON WHEELS
page.content: This is a social service for certain elderly and disabled residents of the area, to ensure they have at least one cooked meal on most days of the week. The list of people receiving meals and the list of volunteer helpers is arranged by the local organsier. The meals, in individual containers, are collected from the kitchen at{Aweldeg Residential Home,} transported in a heat retaining box which fits into the boot of a car, and delivered to the appropriate people. Special diets can be catered for e.g. diabetics. No meals are delivered at present during Tuesdays or at the weekends. Each meal costs 60p. Members of local chapels, churches and local organisations distribute the meals. Twelve people receive the meals at present; the service as it stands, could only deal with a few more.
